persona.name: Kennedy
persona.bio: Kennedy, a 33-year-old full-time crypto trader, combines frugality with an independent spirit to navigate the volatile world of digital currencies. With years of experience under their belt, Kennedy emphasizes a cooperative approach, often collaborating with fellow traders to share insights and strategies. Their disciplined, cost-conscious mindset ensures they make well-informed, strategic investments while maintaining a balanced and community-oriented perspective on trading.
